title: Get Rochelle Humes entire New Look outfit here, for as little as £22.99
text:
Get the biggest Weekly Fashion stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Rochelle Humes has been a fashion icon since her 'The Saturdays' days, and in recent years has been known for presenting the fashion segment on This Morning, as well as often taking the reigns off fashion favourite Holly and standing in for the main show too.

It's no wonder why Rochelle has so many fans keen to copy her style, as the former singer has become renowned for her sharp tailoring looks when she takes to the screen.

During her down time, Mrs Humes mixes it up, and opts for midi dresses and skirts paired with cosy knits.

And this week is no exception, as the star went for a brown leopard print satin bias skirt, and teamed it with a slouchy over-sized tonal roll neck jumper, both from New Look.

So if you fancy a bit of Rochelle's cosy on-trend style, we have both her jumper and skirt linked up below...

(Image: Instagram @rochellehumes)

Dark Brown Slouchy Roll Neck Jumper

(Image: New Look)

description: Rochelle Humes wears head to toe New Look, and you can get her look here...
